english_example_sentence: If she were not to kill that beautiful songbird, it would sing every morning
russian_example_sentence: Если бы она не убила эту красивую певчую птицу, она пела бы каждое утро
turkish_example_sentence: O güzel şarkı kuşunu öldürmese, her sabah ötüp durardı
